document_data.name: Shaddara
document_data.mainbody: '''Shaddara the Fair''' was the most famous queen of [[Anauria]].
document_data.Activities: Shaddara was a child queen who became a legend of her time. She grew up to become a great hunter and often killed monsters in the [[Hunters' Hills]].
document_data.History: A number of natural landmarks in Anauria were named for the young queen, including the [[Shaddan Hills]] and [[Mount Shaddath]] (known later as [[Rausrawna]]), the westernmost peak of the [[Desertsmouth Mountains]].
document_data.Rumors & Legends: She was said to have been interred within a crypt beneath a temple of [[Jergal]] in the capital city of [[Amazandar]], though this was untrue. The crypt mere housed a ''[[portal]]'' that led to the [[Dungeon of Swords]] far to the west.
